meanings.definition: Happening, done, made, or coming without warning or preparation
meanings.sent1: The suddens rain caught us off guard during our picnic.
meanings.sent2: The suddens arrival of the guests surprised everyone at the party.
meanings.sent3: The suddens change in weather made us quickly pack up our things.
meanings.sent4: Her suddens decision to quit her job left everyone stunned.
meanings.sent5: The suddens noise in the dark alley made me jump in fear.

meanings.definition: Characterized by or occurring without previous warning; unexpected
meanings.sent1: The suddens noise from the kitchen made me curious.
meanings.sent2: His suddens disappearance worried his family and friends.
meanings.sent3: The suddens appearance of a clown at the party made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The suddens burst of laughter from the audience surprised the comedian.
meanings.sent5: The suddens gust of wind blew away the hat from her head.
